item.title: How traveling can help deal with the loss of a loved one
item.dc:creator: Ethan Walker, M.Sc.
item.description: "Embracing new horizons can be a comforting way to cope with grief. Traveling allows us to create beautiful memories while honoring those we've lost. 🌍✨ Join me on this journey of healing and discovery. #HealingThroughTravel #JourneyOfGrief"
